title: Ba Nian
synopsis: This work tells that since ancient times, whether humans or animals, as long as their certain beliefs reach a certain level, they will change into Nian Ling, and the appearance of Nian Ling is strange, but their goal is to unify the world. Pull into hell. And in the afternoon of a certain day, our hero Tang Lingxiu happened to encounter a cat-shaped mind in the pedestrian street, and met Zhang Ruyun, a descendant of the Zhang family, and the flamingo beside her, and they happened in this world full of strange minds. What are the stories? (translated from acfun)
